title: Tailwind Combinator
description: Simplify CSS styling with Tailwind CSS. Tailwind Combinator offers beautifully crafted snippets for various boxshadows, buttons and cards.

title: Portfolio Minute
description: This multitenant web app enables users to create stunning portfolio websites with custom subdomains for personalized experiences. It's been used by 50+ users, completely free and editable.

title: Java Low Level Design
description: This repository contains various Java projects focused on low-level design (LLD) concepts. It includes implementations of different design patterns, as well as specific use cases
